missingColumn.violinError: Select at least one numerical column to display the violin plot.
missingColumn.boxplotError: Select at least one numerical column to display the box plot.
missingColumn.scatterError: Select at least two numerical columns to display the scatter plot.
missingColumn.hexbinError: Select at least two numerical columns to display the hexbin plot.
missingColumn.barError: Select one categorical column to display the bar chart.
missingColumn.correlationError: Select at least two numerical columns to display the correlation plot.
missingColumn.heatmapError: Select at least two categorical columns to display the heatmap chart.
missingColumn.sankeyError: Select at least two categorical columns to display the sankey chart.

permission.notAllowed: Not Allowed, please contact your system administrator
permission.publicMsg: Public (everybody can see and use it)
permission.definePermissions: Define which are the default permissions for other users to access this item
permission.specifyRole: Specify a group / role which you are part of that should have extra rights, such as a group of administrators
permission.buddiesPlaceholder: List of usernames separated by semicolon
permission.buddiesDescription: Buddies are a list of user names that can have advanced rights, such as backup administrators
